extendedInfo.description: A very simple countdown timer. Its raison d'Ãªtre is ease of use - only one click to start the timer.Long-press the buttons to edit the times. Options->Setting for vibrate, volume etc.Useful for many activities: meditation, exercise, etc.Update: Should fix sleep-related bugs.Donations welcome (press menu in app)! :-)

reviews.title: Lean & mean
reviews.comment: Fast and easy to use. Would be even better if the time selection buttons where sorted. E.g. if you change the 20 min button to 27 min, it should move to the position between 25 and 30 min.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Brilliant idea :-)
reviews.comment: So simple, yet so much better than ALL of the top 10 timer apps. This is fantastic, it even beats the iPhone app easily!!! :D It\'s unbelievable this has only 10k downloads^^ I\'m sooo glad I found this!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A timer that doesn\'t waste your time!
reviews.comment: Excellent, one click to select any of 24 lengths of time. If you don\'t like them, just long-press to change them, and they\'ll stay changed. Large selection of musical alarm tones that keep going until you press Silence, and then promptly stop. No multiple timers going at once, but I don\'t need them. I\'d give it six stars (if possible), if only I could use my own MP3s as alarm tones.
reviews.author: David McClamrock

reviews.title: Great little timer.
reviews.comment: Nothing extra, just a great little timer. The simple interface really helps when you have your hands full.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: I use it all the time for making tea, simple and functional! +++
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Had this app since day 1 on my android & is fantastic, use it every day. Only problem is the alarm music doesn\'t loop, so once its gone off that\'s it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Exactly what i needed.
reviews.comment: Unlike other apps it comes up when the timer runs down even if the phone is locked, so the tone can be turned off without unlocking first.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Thank you!reliable simple flawless in background w/screen off & stays in notif-bar. --moto droid
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.comment: What else could you ask for? Raison d\'etre achieved.  \342\200\242 Common, yet customizable, time intervals. \342\200\242 Custom alarms \342\200\242 Volume control and vibrate options. \342\200\242 One touch restart so I am easily reminded to take a stretch break every 20 min.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great tool
reviews.comment: I just wanted to say thank you for such a wonderful and yet simple tool. Right now my family is moving out of a duplex so while packing I use this timer when doing the family laundry at our shared washer and dryer and this timer has come in so handy. Immediatly after the clothes get dried I can fold them and pack em. Plus the timer is so simple to use and runs in the background so I can take and recieve calls. Thank you. You\'ve not only shaved off some time but also some stress. :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No-frills timer...just right
reviews.comment: I have used a number of egg timer applications on my PC and my phone, but I have found this app to be the best- both in terms of size (this app is very light weight) and in terms of functionality (customizable countdown times, no excess steps) Another great feature is that the countdown is available even over a locked screen...  I would love to use a similar app on PC/chrome as well (too much to ask ehh?? :) )  Just one point- the app keeps my HTC Desire screen awake while it is running leading to a drain on the battery..Is that a device specific issue (coz I can still manage if I switch off the display manually)??
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Simple. Nothing fancy, but I like that. Easy to use and helps you keep track of time while working on a project, say you want to finish something in an hour, or cooking a recipe and you need to take something out of the oven in exactly 15 minutes. Simple display, better than an alarm. Counts down the minutes so you can see how much time you have left and be productive.\tSimple. Nothing fancy, but I like that. Easy to use and helps you keep track of time while working on a project, say you want to finish something in an hour, or cooking a recipe and you need to take something out of the oven in exactly 15 minutes. Simple display, better than an alarm. Counts down the minutes so you can see how much time you have left and be productive.
reviews.author: Harmony Calhoun

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: I use this app constantly. Very straightforward, no hunting around through a million settings. Great organizational tool.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app.  doesnt work with 4.1
reviews.comment: something with the notification system. Sorry to uninstall this app I use a few times per week.
reviews.author: Andreas Christoffersen

reviews.comment: works great, thanks so much!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Droid BIONIC
reviews.comment: Finally!!!:) Something perfect :) And you can keep working on your phone!!! I will be donating to this developer next week :)
reviews.author: Lynn Morris

reviews.comment: Simple and the best!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very clean, highly functional. Every button can be set to whatever you like. Makes it very fast and ready to start a timer.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works but should be able to add times together. A bit too simple
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: It\'s simple and just works. I do like things that just do what they are supposed to.
reviews.author: A Google User
